attributes.action: seriously consider changing the National Anthem to "Land Of Hope And Glory"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for all those who would prefer to have "Land Of Hope And Glory" as our National Anthem instead of "God Save The Queen". This is no reflection on Her Majesty or our belief and passion in our monarchy, simply a need for a more inspiring National Anthem.
